column1: One of the things I love about America is our ability to remain hopeful and grateful even in the face of adversity. It's that very spirit that brings us together as one people this Thanksgiving. From my family to yours #HappyThanksgiving! https://t.co/8iIFH8InL1

Serving the people of Southern Illinois in Congress has been the honor of a lifetime and I thank the people of this district for giving me the honor of representing them for another two years in Congress. (2/2)

I could not be prouder of the campaign we ran – a campaign focused on our record and our positive vision for Southern Illinois. Congratulations to Ray Lenzi and his team for a hard-fought campaign. (1/2)
🚨POLLS CLOSE AT 7 PM 🚨  If you haven’t voted yet make sure you get out  ASAP! You can find your polling place at https://t.co/0axaAaBCoA. https://t.co/7Fqk07vR6g

Team Bost is running through the tape! It was great to go door-to-door to speak with voters in my hometown of Murphysboro today. Only 4 1/2 hours until polls close — make sure you get out and vote! https://t.co/AddEZgRhfo

Election Day is underway and it's crucial that you make your voice heard! Our economy values and freedoms all hang in the balance. Be sure to get in line to vote BEFORE 7 PM TONIGHT! Find your polling place here: https://t.co/32NEDvJIqe https://t.co/c6AkQf2FJx

Liberals want you to believe that organized labor only  supports Democrats. But it's not true. I'm proud to say I've received stronger labor support than almost any Republican in Congress. They know I'm fighting for Southern Illinois' working families every single day. https://t.co/enIRUYTWNO
Things are heating up with 24 hours to go until Election Day! Honored to have the Belleville firefighters join me for door-to-door canvassing in Belleville this morning. https://t.co/dNgUi4IH7Z

We are in the home stretch of the campaign! Tracy and I  spent the afternoon door knocking in Alton and ran into Ruth Bell who has already voted Republican! Make sure you get out and vote by November 3rd! https://t.co/VRTls83THc

At a time when law enforcement officers are under siege from politicians & activists demanding they be disbanded & defunded I am & will always be proud to stand w/them.   To our Southern IL police & first responders thank you for all you do to keep our communities safe. (2/2)

On National First Responder Day I’m honored to be joined by John Dunning to announce that our campaign has been endorsed by the @IllinoisFOP. Our men and women in blue put their lives on the line every day to protect our Southern Illinois communities. (1/2) https://t.co/82adbCi1el

Happy to announce a new endorsement this morning! I’m honored to have the support of the Council of Prison Locals. The work of our Southern IL correctional officers is vitally important & I'll continue fighting to ensure they have the resources they need to safely do their jobs. https://t.co/LmpN4cfyG9
Had a great time in Columbia yesterday! Thanks to the Monroe County Republican Central Committee for a very warm welcome! https://t.co/hmZKg2KMTS
🚨10 DAYS UNTIL ELECTION DAY🚨  #TeamBost is busy talking to voters across the district at the 🚪 doors and on the 📞 phones! https://t.co/w1rtpYDXoc
Just wrapped up a great candidate forum in Waterloo tonight with the Monroe County Independent Republic-Times Farm Bureau and Chamber of Commerce. Stay tuned to watch it soon! https://t.co/65rSM9OZDN
I’m proud to have their support and look forward to continuing working together in the years ahead. (2/2)

As a father & grandfather I couldn't be happier to be joined by @ieanea President Kathi Griffin to announce IEA's endorsement of our campaign. Southern IL is blessed w/ many great teachers who’ve been working tirelessly to educate our kids throughout the COVID-19 shutdown. (1/2) https://t.co/Iw8V6cUIHM

Tracy & I have been overwhelmed by the number of texts calls & social media comments we've received from friends wishing us well over the past week. Today some folks even drove by the house! Thanks to everyone who came by or reached out — we’re blessed to have you in our lives. https://t.co/dMcRCqCYjm

Some candidates rely on false attacks silly gimmicks & publicity stunts to motivate their campaigns. But for me it’s always been about the people. YOU are what makes Team Bost & our campaign different. Tracy & I are blessed to have you. We’re excited to see you all soon! (2/2)

I wanted to let our friends and supporters know that Tracy and I continue to do well during our quarantine as we recover from COVID-19. All of our campaign staff that I was in close contact with also tested negative and have no symptoms whatsoever. (1/2)

While I'm still quarantining at home as I recover from COVID-19 my work doesn't stop. I spoke with Aaron Price from Williamson & Franklin County News today about a variety of issues including how campaigning in 2020 looks a little different than in past years. https://t.co/93q44V3qqC
I've helped lead the fight in Congress to protect our miners' health care and pensions and I couldn't be prouder to have their support. (2/2)

My grandfather was a United Mine Workers union rep. Mining is in my blood. Today I was honored to be joined by Bernie Harsy president of United Mine Workers Local 1825 to announce that @MineWorkers has endorsed our campaign. (1/2) https://t.co/sy2x3wqS3p
It was great to speak with @WSIURadio's Jennifer Fuller and @thesouthern's Alee Quick this morning for a candidate profile that they will be releasing in the coming days! https://t.co/b3XWHIGAuk

I am proud to have the strong endorsement of both the National Association of Letter Carriers and the National Rural Letter Carriers' Association. They don't need silly gimmicks; they need a leader who will fight for them. (2/2) https://t.co/8U1SYTaGBz

Over the summer our opponent paraded around post offices across Southern IL in a publicity stunt designed to deceive voters into believing I didn't care about our postal workers or the integrity of our elections. But he couldn't fool the men & women who actually do the job. (1/2)
https://t.co/oiHQ4froOb

Folks I’m fighting back against Nancy Pelosi’s radical agenda of government-controlled healthcare defunding the police and ripping jobs from our local communities. I will always protect Southern Illinois and our values. Check out my newest TV ad now! https://t.co/JrSKnqqCd0

I spent some time passing out literature to voters in Bethalto yesterday.   Please make a plan to vote and have your voice heard. We are down to less than 4 weeks until Election Day and I am asking for your vote! https://t.co/plL9Yjj2xi

Over 13000 federal employees call Southern IL home. These public servants have dedicated their careers to serving the American people. I’m honored to have @AFGENational's endorsement & will continue to advocate for the needs of our Southern IL federal employees in Congress. https://t.co/fiBidj03Yd
Just returned home from a busy week in Washington D.C. and I’m saddling up for the campaign ahead! 🇺🇸  Thank you Randolph County for an awesome “Get Out the Vote” rally! https://t.co/BH2Qkt8ZMA

Thank you to the @aisisteel for your support and kind words in the @bellevillenewsd earlier this week! I'm proud to stand shoulder to shoulder with America's steel producers the dedicated men and women working in the industry and the communities who are strengthened by them. https://t.co/yNi7zxjbTI

These essential workers have been on front lines in recent months ensuring passengers and products make it to their final destination safely during the COVID-19 shutdown. They move our nation forward and I'm proud to have their support. (2/2)

Excited to announce that our campaign has been backed by a trio of key unions representing working men and women in the transportation industry: @WeAreALPA @transportworker and @NATCA! (1/2) https://t.co/4d6S6a4FiC
We've got a new endorsement today hot off the press! Excited to share that our campaign has been endorsed by the Chicago Tribune! https://t.co/c5aWVvHuyv

As a small business owner I’ve seen the impact the COVID-19 shutdown has had on our local businesses with many fighting tooth & nail to survive. I am honored to receive the @USChamber’s endorsement & will continue working to get our Southern IL businesses back on their feet. https://t.co/MvfOgDx3Co

Perfect day for #TeamBost to talk to voters about the issues that matter. Thanks to the volunteers across the district for your hard work today!  🏃‍♀️Knocking on doors in Belleville 📋Passing out literature in O’Fallon 📞Making calls in Carbondale 📍Putting up signs in Franklin Co. https://t.co/0U8smAyrzK

On World Maritime Day I’m excited to announce our campaign has been endorsed by not one but FOUR maritime labor orgs — @MMP_Union @MEBAUNION American Maritime Officers & @SeafarersUnion. I’m honored to have their support & will continue to stand w/maritime workers in Congress. https://t.co/udIC31oCNS
Illinois early voting starts today! Visit https://t.co/0axaAaBCoA to find a polling location near you! https://t.co/CQcZbryjOG
Today is National Voter Registration Day! You can check your registration status at https://t.co/0axaAaBCoA — make sure you are registered if you want to vote November 3rd! https://t.co/bjCBV7rtyi

Through their skilled craftsmanship Americans in the carpentry industry have quite literally built our communities and reinforced our economy. I’m honored to have the support of the @STLKCCRC and will continue to fight for our Southern Illinois working families in Congress. https://t.co/BrDbn4AFEv

It was a chilly start to a beautiful Saturday day-of-action. #TeamBost is all over IL-12 today!   🇺🇸Delivering signs in Alton 🇺🇸Phone banking in Carbondale 🇺🇸Knocking on doors in Waterloo 🇺🇸Talking to voters in Granite City 🇺🇸Walking neighborhoods in Du Quoin https://t.co/QKV2Oe8pGC

Southern IL has a proud sporting heritage & law abiding gun owners understand that firearms also play a role in keeping our families safe. As a gun owner & sportsman I'm honored to receive @NRAPVF's endorsement & will continue to support your 2nd Amendment rights in Congress. https://t.co/a2cXWMphyc

Today marks 233 years since our Founding Fathers signed what would become the greatest governing document in history the U.S. Constitution. Our Constitution guarantees our freedom & outlines how our government is to be limited. Join me in celebrating this special document today! https://t.co/MtVXzMimjL

This year has been eventful; After China unleashed the pandemic that knocked us off our stride we fought back! While COVID-19 isn’t behind us just yet I'm confident that our best days lie ahead. I'm running for re-election b/c I believe in Southern IL & the values we hold dear. https://t.co/Ipkrx457Gh

Our nation is only as strong as our willingness to protect the most vulnerable among us. During my time in Congress I've fought to eliminate taxpayer funding for abortion & to preserve pro-life health care providers’ rights of conscience. Honored to have the @nrlc's endorsement. https://t.co/GyizEfH6gv

Team Bost hasn’t even finished delivering all of our yard signs and yet we are already getting reports of Bost and Trump signs being vandalized in Jackson County. Please let us know if this happens to you so we can report to the authorities and get a new sign back up! https://t.co/dRUUD7PAmS

A little rain up north and a little sunshine down south. #TeamBost has been busy covering all corners of IL-12 today! 🇺🇸  🔘Door knocking in Marion  🔘Putting up signs in Mt. Vernon 🔘Passing out literature in O’Fallon https://t.co/uZdtjEDnHe

Agriculture is the foundation of our Southern IL economy. I'm honored to receive the @ILFarmBureau's endorsement &  Friend of Agriculture Award. From passing the USMCA to working to expand rural broadband to supporting the RFS Southern IL farmers have a fighter on their side. https://t.co/s4bGSIkfcb

At 8:46 am on Sept 11 2001 hijackers flew the 1st plane into the World Trade Center's North Tower. 17 min later the 2nd plane hit the South Tower. We remember those lost in NY PA & DC & their families & honor the brave men & women who risked all to save others. #NeverForget https://t.co/bVjJC2AgOy

As a small business owner I'm honored to announce our campaign has been endorsed by @NFIB. Our Southern Illinois small businesses & their employees were hit hard by the COVID-19 shutdown & I'll continue working to get them the support they need to come back stronger than ever. https://t.co/Fc5hPhxFag

Happy Labor Day to the working men & women who help make America the most vibrant economic engine in the world. Today I couldn't be prouder to announce our campaign has been endorsed by the Southern & Central Illinois Laborers' District Council of @LIUNA. https://t.co/8L4UTq9oJ9 https://t.co/CkIuvAYrPE

As a former firefighter I am honored to announce that our first endorsement this year is from @AFFI1935. I am grateful for our Southern IL firefighters & their unwavering dedication to the safety of our communities & am humbled to receive their support. https://t.co/tR54Jq8XpF https://t.co/Nip2JLD4uX

Team Bost has been busy putting up yard signs!🇺🇸  If you already requested one yours will be delivered shortly. If you would like to request one click this link here >>>https://t.co/ZV9lt2kLHz https://t.co/aJErQA0447
Tracy and I are at the White House for President Trump's @GOPconvention acceptance speech. Make sure to tune in later tonight and watch it! #RNC2020 https://t.co/k8lRpoL675

America will always be the land of the free because of the brave. Make sure you tune into the @GOPconvention tonight to hear more about how President Trump is supporting our nation's heroes! #RNC2020 https://t.co/zdP56TLDwa
Tracy and I just landed in DC and are excited to attend President Trump's @GOPconvention speech tomorrow night! #RNC2020 https://t.co/ZYjjTIE6pS

Looking forward to another great night of the @GOPconvention! Before America was struck with COVID-19 we had record economic growth and more opportunities for all Americans to succeed. Under @POTUS we are seeing economic expansion return and will come back stronger! #RNC2020 https://t.co/I34HN7NHPQ

Excited for the first night of speeches at the @GOPconvention!  Since the founding of our nation the United States has been the land of promise and President Trump has delivered results to help ensure it continues to be for future generations. Promises made promises kept. https://t.co/OE1D6HUF1W
🚨YARD SIGN ALERT🚨  Fill out the form below and Team Bost will deliver a sign to your house!  >>>https://t.co/ZV9lt2kLHz https://t.co/u0d8Y6eRZa

House Speaker Madigan has undermined the trust of the people of Illinois for too long. And now he's under federal investigation for his shady deals. It's time he resigns! If you agree sign our petition now ➡️ https://t.co/vpCm66mDPj
I’m working hard to make sure Republicans regain control of the House in November but I can’t do it alone. Click the link and sign up to volunteer today! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/4M9zNmguGV

244 years ago the Declaration of Independence was adopted and our great nation began. Please take some time today and remember those who have fought and are still fighting for our freedom. I wish you a safe and happy #4thofJuly! https://t.co/V96DHL4tsH
ICYMI: I was on the @anniefreyshow today discussing Governor Pritzker’s shutdown and the impact it has on Southern Illinois.￼￼ https://t.co/6IM2FTozwL

🚨URGENT Call To Action🚨  Illinois Republicans are suing Governor Pritzker. We're absolutely fed up with the hypocrisy and illegality of Governor Pritzker's shutdown of Southern Illinois.   Join the fight and help us win! @ILGOP   https://t.co/odq2RFYojd https://t.co/pyqiZQpeOk

It's President @realDonaldTrump's birthday & I'd like to show him that Southern Illinois stands strongly behind him & is wishing him a happy birthday! Will you please take a moment to wish the President a happy birthday by adding your name below? https://t.co/XYvj1L6e3w

The stakes of this election are ⬆️high⬆️. I want to make sure Republicans regain control of the House but I need your help. Join our fight by volunteering to 📞make phone calls📞 or 📋knock on doors📋 today! https://t.co/lLRJtlViqR

The radical left is exploiting a terrible tragedy to paint all law enforcement officers in a negative light. These same radicals are demanding we defund & abolish police departments around the country. Sign our petition to oppose these radical demands. https://t.co/BuLTuSEhWN
Join me in wishing Vice President @Mike_Pence a very happy birthday!   Here’s a throwback from 2018 in O’Fallon. https://t.co/LmVJyLt66M

On the 76th Anniversary of the Allied invasion of Normady we honor the bravery and commitment of the greatest generation.   Join me in saluting the soldiers who gave the ultimate sacrifice while storming the beaches and skies on #DDay. https://t.co/r3qc4ZYtBR
A great tribute to the generations of brave Americans who have laid down their lives for our nation. We are forever grateful for their service and their sacrifice. https://t.co/kyyqFtPTii

Today and every day we honor our nation’s veterans who made the ultimate sacrifice. May we never forget those brave Americans who died fighting for our freedom and way of life. https://t.co/eO6duG9dOm
My opponent has always run a smear campaign but he has sunk to a new low by bringing my family into the political arena. https://t.co/FBWvWkUsmX

Gov. Pritzker’s stay-at-home order mandates the shutdown of church services even as other institutions inch towards reopening. I believe the ability to worship and celebrate faith is vitally important. If you agree sign ⁦@ILGOP⁩’s petition below.  https://t.co/f6X8FZSG77

There are differences between Southern Illinois and Chicago. We can reopen businesses in Southern Illinois safely and get people back to work. Sign our petition and tell Governor Pritzker it's time to reopen Southern Illinois. https://t.co/JwhiqAcG2W

Proud to be #SouthernIllinoisStrong! Now more than ever our Southern Illinois businesses need our support. Visit https://t.co/ZbKXNZb862 to learn more about how you can help provide grants to local businesses! https://t.co/QHaDebHivD
